subject: Re: Order #SSN3658 confirmed

conversations.body_text: Hi Christos Foudoulis,    The German warehouse is experiencing low inventory levels, and there have been some unexpected delays in restocking. We have shipped your order via express courier, with the final leg handled by UPS. Should any customs duties arise, we will cover them for you—please rest assured.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3263710923863
